title: Comforting spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '500g beef mince', '2 large white onions, chopped', '2 large carrots, chopped into slices or chunks', '1 red bell pepper, sliced', '1 yellow or orange bell pepper, sliced', '150 to 200g chestnut mushrooms, sliced', '2 to 3 tins cherry tomatoes in sauce', '3 teaspoons dried Italian herbs', '1 teaspoon oregano', '2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon paprika', 'sea salt to taste', '1 teaspoon cayenne chilli pepper (optional)', '2 teaspoons Worcesteshire sauce', '500g pasta of your choice']
